ValidationRule.description: Checks if the User Country is included in the valid countries list.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT( Country__c = "CHILE"),
NOT(Country__c = "PERU"),
NOT(Country__c = "BRASIL"),
NOT(Country__c = "COLOMBIA"),
NOT(Country__c = "ARGENTINA"),
NOT(Country__c = "ITALY"),
NOT(Country__c = "SOUTH AFRICA"),
NOT(Country__c = "ROMANIA"),
NOT(Country__c = "SPAIN"),
NOT(Country__c = "GLOBAL")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please include a valid country (CHILE, PERU, BRASIL, COLOMBIA, ARGENTINA, ITALY, SOUTH AFRICA, ROMANIA, SPAIN, GLOBAL)
